Rub=E9n, unfortunately that project is very old and the code would be qui=
te difficult to polish up and release at this point.  There are a number of=
 NEAT versions out there though that do have demo code for a variety of suc=
cessful experiments.  There is also HyperNEAT code for multiagent predator =
prey in HyperSharpNEAT on this page:

http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/software.html=


The sensor and robot control code is similar to what was used in the 
rob=
ot duel demo.

ken
